1.title: It's a Celebration

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Ray returns with a new album, a new house and a new girl, which not everyone is happy about causing Ray to question if this is the right time to be in a relationship. Brandy is confronted with a life changing decision.

2.title: Don't Mess Up and Don't Embarrass Me

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: It's the day before Brandy's first performance on "Dancing with the Stars" and her nervesare getting the better of her. Ray's demons are back and challenge him to make a tough decision.

3.title: Is This the Guy?

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Brandy is ready to get back into the dating world and with the help of her best friend Shay, prepares for a blind date. Meanwhile, an unexpected woman shows up at Ray's door and offers him something he's never had before.

4.title: Video Chick Killed the Music Star

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Ray J is hard at work--with both his new album and his relationship with girlfriendBrittany - but it all could come crashing down when temptation strikes. Ray turns toBrandy for advice but what he hears is unexpected...

5.title: All Men Are Animals

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: A girl's day with best friend Shay leads to a double date Brandy will never forget. Meanwhile, Ray's on a double date of his own with girlfriend Brittany and receives an interesting outlook on how to deal with with women.

6.title: When It Starts Right, It Ends Right...

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Brandy receives a troubling phone call about her bestfriend Shay that shocks her andthreatens to destroy their friendship. Meanwhile, while surrounded by women, Rayattempts to put his body through positions he's never tried.

7.title: This Is War

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Tensions run high when Sonja blows up in the middle of a business meeting and puts Ray's image on the line and things only get worse when Ray confronts his mother. Meanwhile, Brandy is back in the studio trying new things.

8.title: Taking a Stand

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Brandy and her "Dancing with the Stars" partner Maks are still at odds and an exhausted Brandy considers ending the whole thing. Ray's problems with his mom continue and he is left wondering if he can finally stand up to her.

9.title: One Thing or the Other

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: While busy promoting the first single off his major label debut, Ray and Brittany's relationship is hit with another major roadblock, putting their future on the rocks...again.

10.title: You Smell Like Soap

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Both Brandy and Ray confide with others about their big fight while continuing to lead separate lives.

11.title: Last Wish

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Brandy takes a new approach with her love life and Ray gears up for the biggest night of his career.

1.title: Tough Act to Follow

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Brandy and Ray J's mom, Sonja, wants the kids to start handling more of the behind-the-scenes business so that she can take a step back. But whether or not Ray J and Brandy are ready for that is yet to be determined.

2.title: Singled Out

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: It's time to tape the "For The Love of Ray J 2" reunion show, but Ray is dreading having to face the girl he picked in the end, Mz Berry. Meanwhile, Brandy must come to terms with a complicated romance of her own.

3.title: When Business Gets Personal

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Ray J wants to record an album with super-producer Rodney Jerkins, but he's surprised to find out that Brandy has issues with Rodney and is against the deal.

4.title: House of Blues

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Brandy has an important performance with Timbaland but when office antics get in the way of what should be a happy occasion, some deepseeded family issues come to light that threaten to derail the family business.

5.title: Picking Up the Pieces

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Sonja and Brandy try to figure out why their mother-daughter relationship is so strained. On the business end, Ray J's priorities are called into question and he must decide whether to defend his ways or take a new approach.

6.title: Taking Control

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: It's Brandy's 31st birthday and Ray J comes along to help her celebrate in Miami. Sonja and Willie make the most of their time apart from the kids and rekindle some romance.

7.title: Go Big or Go Home

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Brandy is upset and begins to question if being a part of this family business is even a good idea anymore. Ray J tries to help Brandy get more positive and productive, but will it be enough?

8.title: Balancing Act

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Brandy and Sonja work on improving their relationship. Meanwhile Ray J's growing success makes things complicated with his friends who are still struggling to make it.

9.title: Looking Back

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: The Norwoods take the family business to the next level as Brandy and Ray J pursue record deals.

10.title: Let's Make a Deal

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Sonja spends some quality time with each of her kids, braving the wilderness on a camping trip with Brandy then visiting the old neighborhood in Carson, California where Ray grew up.

11.title: Family Reunion

episode of.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: The Norwoods head back to their small hometown of McComb, Mississippi for a family reunion complete with old stories, food, fishing, dancing and of course, music.

imdb.title: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business
akas: Brandy & Ray J: A Family Business (United States)
plot: Superstar siblings Brandy & Ray J Norwood are back at it again in the second season of their hit reality series, They continue to give the audience a deeper insight into their exciting and complicated lives in and out of the spotlight.
